price: Hawangojei ila ukelele mmoja tu utakao wachukua nao wamo kuzozana.
arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ تَأۡخُذُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَخِصِّمُونَ
footnotes: Hawangojei ila sauti moja tu, iwamalize kwa ghafla, nao wakizozana katika mambo ya kidunia, wameghafilika na Akhera.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: mā yanẓurūna illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan takhudhuhum wahum yakhiṣṣimūna
